    public final class CIELab
extends Tuple3
    A color in CIE Lab color space.

    Brad Kimmel

        public static CIELab fromXYZ(double X,
                             double Y,
                             double Z,
                             CIEXYZ ref)
        Converts a colour from CIE XYZ colour space to CIE Lab colour space.
        Parameters:
        X - The X coordinate in CIE XYZ colour space.
        Y - The Y coordinate in CIE XYZ colour space.
        Z - The Z coordinate in CIE XYZ colour space.
        ref - The CIEXYZ for the reference white.
        Returns:
        The specified colour in CIE Lab colour space.
